description_html:
This contemporary table lamp manages to be the perfect blend of dark and light, round and slender, simple and artistic. The wide double shade design features an inner white fabric shade surrounded by a black metal band. The slim base and dual pull-chains come in an elegant chrome finish.

• 26" high.
• Fabric inner shade is 14" across top and bottom x 5" high.
• Metal outer shade 16" wide x 3" high.
• Uses two maximum 60 watt or equivalent bulbs (not included).
• Dual on-off pull-chain switches.
• Chrome and black chrome finish base and accents.
• Metal construction.
• White fabric shade.
product_name: Geordi Double Shade Table Lamp by Possini Euro Design
